name: Boing Ball
description:
Game Made on Unity 2019.4.0f1

Everything by me (code, assets, particles, UI animations etc...)

The font used : Odibee_Sans

Controls Keyboard :

  • Pause : P
  • More Width: Left arrow
  • Less Width: Right arrow

Controls Controller:

  • Pause: Start
  • More Width: Left trigger / shoulder
  • Less Width: Right trigger / shoulder
  • UI Move: Right joystick
